Norse gods:
(Freyja,Norse,Chariot pulled by cats,Sword)
(Odin,Norse,Eight-legged flying horse called Sleipnir,Spear called Gungnir)
(Thor,Norse,Goats Tanngrisnir and Tanngnjóstr,Hammer called Mjölnir)

Greek gods:
(Hera,Greek,Peacock or Cuckoo,Scepter)
(Poseidon,Greek,Horse,Trident)
(Zeus,Greek,Eagle,Thunderbolt)

Egyptian gods:
(Anubis,Egyptian,Jackal,Scepter)
(Horus,Egyptian,Falcon,Spear)
(Isis,Egyptian,Cow,Scepter)
(Ra,Egyptian,Sun disk with cobra,Staff)
